original_text: I want all the believers to become strong in their spirits. I want them to help each other because they love one another. Then God will bless them very much, because they understand God's secret message very well. They will be completely sure of it. And they will know Christ himself, who is God's secret.
korean_text: 이는 그들로 마음에 위안을 받고 사랑 안에서 연합하여 확실한 이해의 모든 풍성함과 하나님의 비밀인 그리스도를 깨닫게 하려 함이니

sentences.original_text: to become strong in their spirits
I want them to help each other
Then God will bless them very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님께서 그들을 크게 축복하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: because they understand God's secret message very well
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 하나님의 비밀 메시지를 아주 잘 이해하기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: They will be completely sure of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것에 대해 완전히 확신할 것이다

sentences.original_text: And they will know Christ himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그리스도 자신을 알게 될 것이다
